original_title: U2 & The Police: A Conspiracy of Hope
overview: TRACKLIST  U2:  MLK  Pride (In The Name Of Love)  Bad  Sunday Bloody Sunday  Maggie's Farm / Cold Turkey (Snippet)  Help!  Sun City (With Lou Reed & Nona Hendrix & Little Steven & Ruben Blades )  The Police:  Message in a bottle  King of pain  Driven to tears  Every breath you take  Roxanne  Invisible Sun (The Police & Bono )  All-Stars-Finale:  I Shall Be Released
tagline: Benefit tour by Amnesty International (Giants Stadium, East Rutherford, NJ, June 15th 1986)
title: U2 & The Police: A Conspiracy of Hope
